verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> <S%H516>Altaschith,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> or <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph.<s%> To you, O <S%H430>God,<s%> do we give <S%H3034>thanks,<s%> to you do we give <S%H3034>thanks:<s%> for that your <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> your <S%H6381>wondrous<s%> works <S%H5608>declare.<s%>
The <S%H776>earth<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof are <S%H4127>dissolved:<s%> I <S%H8505>bear<s%> up the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of it. <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1984>fools,<s%> Deal not <S%H1984>foolishly:<s%> and to the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> <S%H7311>Lift<s%> not up the <S%H7161>horn:<s%>
<S%H7311>Lift<s%> not up your <S%H7161>horn<s%> on <S%H4791>high:<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> not with a <S%H6277>stiff<s%> <S%H6677>neck.<s%>
For <S%H7311>promotion<s%> comes <S%H3808>neither<s%> from the <S%H4161>east,<s%> nor from the <S%H4628>west,<s%> nor from the <S%H4057>south.<s%>
But <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H8199>judge:<s%> he <S%H8213>puts<s%> <S%H8213>down<s%> one, and <S%H7311>sets<s%> up <S%H2088>another.<s%>

For in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> there is a <S%H3563>cup,<s%> and the <S%H3196>wine<s%> is <S%H923>red;<s%> it is <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H4538>mixture;<s%> and he <S%H5064>pours<s%> out of the <S%H2088>same:<s%> but the <S%H8105>dregs<s%> thereof, <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H4680>wring<s%> them out, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> them.
But I will <S%H5046>declare<s%> for <S%H5769>ever;<s%> I will sing praises to the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> also will I <S%H1438>cut<s%> off; but the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be <S%H7311>exalted.<s%>
